name: Hush Puppies
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Beat together the corn meal, baking powder, salt, milk and water. Blend in egg and onion. With hands, mold mixture into little cakes (about 1 tablespoon each) and fry in about 1 inch deep fat until well browned (1 1/2 minutes on each side). Drain on paper. Serve very hot.
